description: A diagram object that represents an abstract diagram

Name.description: a Diagram will be given a Name by the user, if not set the default will be New Diagram

Shapes.description: An array of Shape Object that represents the shapes inside a particular Diagram

ID.description: The ID of the shape will be the UID of the shape object

ShapeType.description:
a template type which indicates what thing this shape represents
such like pod, svc, deployment etc..

ContainedBy.description:
a reference to the shape ID that is Conatining this shape inside it
may be used when creating a NameSpace shape and a pod is being drawed inside this Namespace shape

Apperance.description: the shape appearance properties which decide how it is being displayed in the FE

Width.description: the width of the rectangular representation of the shape in px

Height.description: the Height of the rectangular representation of the shape in px

PosX.description: the Position of the rectangular surrounding of the shape object top left corner, by default should be automatically set to the X position of the mouse once the shape is dropped in a diagram

PosY.description: the Position of the rectangular surrounding of the shape object top left corner on Y measure, by default should be automatically set to the Y position of the mouse once the shape is dropped in a diagram

src.description: the ID of the Src shape that the connector connects it with the other shape

dist.description: the ID of the Distination shape that the connector connects it with the other shape

ConnectorType.description: the Type of connector for letting the BE know what logical actions should be applied over the final Diagram instance shapes
